docs.title: About the Project
docs.text: Cardano.nix is a collection of Nix packages and NixOS modules designed to make it easier to operate Cardano related services and infrastructure.

docs.title: cardanoNix.cardano-cli.enable
docs.text:
Whether to enable Install cardano CLI tools and scripts.

Type: boolean

Default: false

Example: true

Declared by: - https://github.com/mlabs-haskell/cardano.nix/tree/master/modules/cardano-cli

docs.title: cardanoNix.globals.network
docs.text:
Cardano network to join/use

Type: one of “mainnet”, “preprod”, “preview”, “private”, “sanchonet”

Default: "mainnet"

Declared by: - https://github.com/mlabs-haskell/cardano.nix/tree/master/modules/globals

docs.title: cardanoNix.globals.networkNumber
docs.text:
Cardano network number to join/use (should match cardanoNix.globals,network)

Internal: true

Type: signed integer

Default: config.cardanoNix.globals.networkNumbers.${config.cardanoNix.globals.net}

Declared by: - https://github.com/mlabs-haskell/cardano.nix/tree/master/modules/globals

docs.title: cardanoNix.globals.networkNumbers
docs.text:
Cardano network numbers

Internal: true

Type: attribute set of signed integer

Default:

{
  mainnet = 0;
  preprod = 1;
  preview = 2;
  private = 42;
  sanchonet = 4;
}

Declared by: - https://github.com/mlabs-haskell/cardano.nix/tree/master/modules/globals
